name: Colin Has A Rocket Launcher
description:
GRAB YOUR ROCKET LAUNCHER AND BLAST AWAY WAVES OF FOES WITH UNIQUE ABILITIES!

  • This is a short game experience filled with tons of rockets and booms!
  • Get blasting!
  • Kaboom!

INFO FOR YOUR HANDS:
Left Mouse Button - Shoot Rocket
Right Mouse Button - Freeze Time (If you have Stopwatch)
Enter Key - Pause
M key - Toggle music on/off (when paused)
F Key - Toggle fullscreen (when paused)

Made this a few years ago for a co-worker. Have fun! Feedback is helpful! Or check out my other games that I will hopefully find time to upload.

Game, graphics and music by me. Credit for font used in title image goes to AJ Paglia from dafonts.com.
